Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Task Analysis Goal Merge two event logs Log A primary timeline timestamps received time fewer attributes Log B richer attributes offset timestamps different event names Matching basis order_id time proximity tolerance 2 seconds Rules Merge confident match same order close time Keep unique Enrich attributes Resolve timestamps Output chronological Include reasoning

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Tolerance 2 seconds Event 1 A 100000 Order Received B 095958 OrderReceived Diff 2 seconds Within tolerance Represents same Merge Potential High Event 2 A 100130 Order Validated B 100129 OrderValidation Diff 1 second Within tolerance Same event Merge High

Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: Event 3 A 100200 Payment Processed B 100205 PaymentCheck Diff 5 seconds Both mention payments

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Crucial Decision Point Option A No match keep separate Option B Match function similarity Refined Analysis strict less than 2 seconds no match Alternative Payment Processed conclusion of Payment Check

Name: Backtracking - NE
Text: Decision not match Re-reading timestamps offset few seconds or ms 5s significant Correction Log A received not started Decision flag separate Self-correction usually match but strict 2s Alternative near match but confident no Lets look next events Decision treat not match violate rule

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Event 4 A 100500 Item Shipped B 100502 Shipping Diff 2 seconds Assume tolerance 2 seconds Match Event 5 A 102000 Item Delivered No B match

Name: Inductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Summary of Mappings 1 Order Received match Diff 2s 2 Order Validated match 1s 3 Payment no match Diff 5s 4 Item Shipped match 2s 5 Item Delivered unique

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Normalize Names Order Received OrderReceived Order Validated OrderValidation Payment Processed PaymentCheck Item Shipped Shipping Final Logic Flow Filter Order Sort Timestamp primary Log A

Name: Validation - IND
Text: Detailed Construction Output rows Timestamp Event Order ID User ID Resource ID Notes from B for matches Payment separate no notes Item Shipped match notes Package handed Final Plan merge 1 2 4 separate 3 5 strict 2s rule

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - IND
Text: If match Payment tolerance 5s lose strictness If not merge miss note gateway delay If strict less than 2s 2s borderline for shipped and first
